# AVCaptionRubyPosition.before

**Case**

Display ruby text above horizontal text, or to the right of vertical text in a right-to-left block progression.

## Declaration

```swift
case before
```

## Ruby positions

- **AVCaptionRubyPosition.after**: Display ruby text below horizontal text, or to the left of vertical text in a right-to-left block progression.
